newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Trading of Recor Holdings suspended.
newsitem.headline: Trading of Recor Holdings suspended.

text.p: Trading in shares of audio products and television manufacturer Recor Holdings Ltd was suspended at the company's request pending an announcement, the Hong Kong stock exchange said on Friday
Shares of Recor ended unchanged at HK$1.55 per share on Thursday on a volume of 140,000.
Recor makes audio products, televisions and telephones.
